api/app/app.controller.js
index
description:
get apps according to condition, usually we use 
this function to find apps under some space, in case
we need provide spaceId as params, format like: {spaceId=xxx},
if provide userId, it will navigate to findUserApps

unknown.tagValue:
{array} return array of app object, and in each app it
contain nuts under app, format like: [{_id:xxx,name:xxx, nuts: [...]}]

return.description:
return array of app object, and in each app it
contain nuts under app, format like: [{_id:xxx,name:xxx, nuts: [...]}]

name: show
description:
get one app. mention: if want find app by query, 
please use index function to find all expected apps and then 
get first one from array

unknown.tagValue: {object} app object, contain nuts array for app

params.name: req.params.id
params.description: {int} if provide id param, then get by id

return.description: app object, contain nuts array for app

params.name: req.body
params.description: {object} must provide spaceId, name as appName, typeId or type

params.name: req.body
params.description:
{object} must provide spaceId and appDataList or appDataCollection
format like: {spaceId: xxx, appDataList(appDataCollection): []}

api/space/space.controller.js
index
description: get all spaces according to condition

unknown.tagValue: {Array} array of spaces, format like: [ {_id: xxx, name: xxx, apps:[], roles:[], type:{},...},...]

return.description: array of spaces, format like: [ {_id: xxx, name: xxx, apps:[], roles:[], type:{},...},...]

unknown.tagValue: {Object} space object, format like: {_id: xxx, name: xxx, apps:[], roles:[], type:{},...}

return.description: space object, format like: {_id: xxx, name: xxx, apps:[], roles:[], type:{},...}

name: create
description:
create a new space, this function call Space model add function to complete create of space
please see Space.add function for more information of creating space

unknown.tagValue: {Array} array of spaces, format like: [ {_id: xxx, name: xxx, apps:[], roles:[], type:{},...},...]

params.name: req.body
params.description: {object}, format like: {name:xxx, alias:xxx, type:{name:xxx, alias:xxx}, roles: [{...}...]}

return.description: array of spaces, format like: [ {_id: xxx, name: xxx, apps:[], roles:[], type:{},...},...]

name: findUserSpaces
description:
create a new space, this function call Space model add function to complete create of space
please see Space.add function for more information of creating space

name: userJoin
description: user join to space, by default, will add user as everyone role under space
